alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern La Salle County through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Mendota to La Salle. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... North Utica around 500 PM CDT. Ottawa, Earlville and Naplate around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Prairie Center, Triumph and Troy Grove. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 56 and 77. I-80 between mile markers 74 and 88. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
